content: Hi @Jim Steel did you see this go by with some useful stuff ? http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/case-reporting/profiles.html

Nice! The LMP profile matches ours fairly well (same LOINC code, although we mandate a SNOMED code and they mandate the LOINC code). They also mandate an effective date in addition to the value date. I'm unsure as to why
